programme.title: Trafficked With Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: A 360-degree view of the trafficking world from the point-of-view of the traffickers, law enforcement agents and those caught in the crossfire with access only National Geographic can provide.

programme.title: The Hidden Holocaust
programme.desc: Not every holocaust victim was sent to a concentration camp. Some didn't lose their lives, but instead lost everything that was important to them: their family, their religious identity, their childhood, and their way of life. This Documentary Short profiles Wilhelmina De Kadt, now Willie Juhlin, whose family lived in The Netherlands during World War II. Willie and her brother avoided being sent to a concentration camp, through the kindness of others and a bit of luck. She survived by hiding in plain sight with a Catholic family, and was eventually reunited with her only surviving adult family member, who brought her to America to start a new life.

programme.title: Tentación peligrosa
programme.desc: A murder investigation begins to reveal a hidden world. The participants of a lesbian party become the possible perpetrators of the crime.

programme.title: #Avísamecuandollegues
programme.desc: Each individual episode follows a case of an innocent woman who's been harmed, killed, or abducted by someone on what should have been just another average day.

programme.title: Vacaciones para morir
programme.desc: When a serial killer interrupts the fun at the swanky Coconut Pete's Coconut Beach Resort -- a hedonistic island paradise for swingers --- it's up to the club's staff to stop the violence ... or at least hide it!

programme.title: Tentación peligrosa
programme.desc: A murder investigation begins to reveal a hidden world. The participants of a lesbian party become the possible perpetrators of the crime.

programme.title: La cara que no puedo olvidar
Testigo en peligro
programme.desc: After a fight with her husband, Lucy runs out of the house, and into a night of terror. She heads for the local cinema, and in doing so, becomes the only eyewitness to a couple of crooks, who are robbing the cinema's safe. In her haste to escape the thieves, she is knocked down by a passing bus, and is taken to the local hospital. The two crooks follow, and wait for a chance to finish her off, and thus eliminate the only person who can tie them to the robbery.

programme.title: Pecados capitales Envidia
programme.desc: Gabrielle seems to have it all - a devoted husband, a beautiful daughter, and a successful career in public relations. However, she soon stands to lose everything when she meets Keisha, her devious half sister who wants everything Gabrielle has.

programme.title: Soy Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: The story of Elizabeth Smart's kidnapping and captivity, as told from her perspective.

programme.title: Cake Dynasty
programme.desc: Buddy and his extended family involved in the business growing with restaurants, nationwide shipping, automated cake vending, and more while still staying true to their roots baking thousands of cakes Italian desserts and cookies.

programme.title: La cara que no puedo olvidar

programme.title: Peligro a domicilio
programme.desc: A busy working mother hires a nurse to care for her wealthy father who has early onset dementia. Soon a bizarre deception creeps into play when the seductive nurse makes a play for the family fortune.

programme.title: Camionero grande
programme.desc: Tess Thorne, a famous writer, is determined to seek revenge on the man who brutally assaulted and raped her on a desolate New England road.

programme.title: Sucio secreto
programme.desc: True story based on Jodi Arias, a seductive 28-year-old aspiring photographer found guilty of killing her former lover, Travis Alexander, who was found nude in his home shower with a slit throat, 27 additional stab wounds and a bullet to the head. While investigating the violent killing, Mesa, Arizona police retrieved a digital camera from Alexander’s washing machine, revealing shocking images authorities claim Arias took during their sexual escapades, as well as during and after his murder. While Jodi pled not guilty and contends she killed Alexander in self-defense, police concluded that when he broke off their relationship, she stalked her ex-boyfriend and seduced him one final time before murdering him in cold blood. Her subsequent trial has been grand theater, dominating the cable news networks as she testified in her own defense and offered explicit insight into the sex, lies and obsession that led up to Alexander’s murder.

programme.title: Legends of the Fork
programme.desc: Buddy travels the country visits iconic restaurants to speak with their chefs, taste their cuisine, and discover "secret sauce" to their success.

programme.title: Legends of the Fork
programme.desc: Buddy travels the country visits iconic restaurants to speak with their chefs, taste their cuisine, and discover "secret sauce" to their success.

programme.title: Peligro a domicilio
programme.desc: A busy working mother hires a nurse to care for her wealthy father who has early onset dementia. Soon a bizarre deception creeps into play when the seductive nurse makes a play for the family fortune.

programme.title: Sucio secreto

programme.title: Perseguida
programme.desc: A journalist Lorena and her friend photographer Raul decide to try to take an interview from influential politician Hermenegildo Parra. After several unsuccessful attempts they decide to break into his house and make some photos there but when they enter his cabinet they see him stabbed with the knife. The next day the newspaper announces his death and start to celebrate a big amount of sold copies but during the fiesta a phone calls and it was Mr.Parra "alive and kicking". After this scandal Lorena becomes pursued by some mysterious killers who want to take the negatives from her at any price. The solution of this mystery is very unexpected...

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: After the death of their infant child, a young couple are tormented by a malevolent, supernatural entity.

programme.title: La chica del dragón tatuado
programme.desc: Disgraced journalist Mikael Blomkvist investigates the disappearance of a weary patriarch's niece from 40 years ago. He is aided by the pierced, tattooed, punk computer hacker named Lisbeth Salander. As they work together in the investigation, Blomkvist and Salander uncover immense corruption beyond anything they have ever imagined.

programme.title: Seth Meyers: Vida de Padre
programme.desc: Known for his dry wit and sharp topical commentary as host of Late Night with Seth Meyers, the veteran comedian shifts his focus to his personal life – from the chaos of raising three young kids, to navigating different communication styles in marriage, to the proper way to cross the street in New York City.

programme.title: DC Liga de supermascotas
programme.desc: When Superman and the rest of the Justice League are kidnapped, Krypto the Super-Dog must convince a rag-tag shelter pack - Ace the hound, PB the potbellied pig, Merton the turtle and Chip the squirrel - to master their own newfound powers and help him rescue the superheroes.

programme.title: Rampage: Devastación
programme.desc: El hombre experto en primates Davis Okoye (Dwayne Johnson), un hombre que mantiene a las personas a distancia, comparte un vínculo inquebrantable con George, el gorila de espalada plateada extraordinariamente inteligente que ha estado a su cuidado desde su nacimiento. Pero un experimento genético deshonesto que salió mal transforma a este simpático simio en una criatura furiosa de un tamaño gigantesco. Para empeorar las cosas, pronto se descubre que hay otros animales alterados de forma similar. A medida que esto depredadores alfa recién creados recorren Norteamérica, destruyendo todo a su paso, Okoye se une a un ingeniero genético desacreditado para asegurar un antídoto, abriéndose camino en un campo de batalla en constante cambio, no solo para detener una catástrofe mundial sino para salvar a la temible criatura que alguna vez fue su amigo.

programme.title: Una Película de Minecraft
programme.desc: Bienvenidos al mundo de Minecraft, donde la creatividad no solo te ayuda a crear, ¡sino que es esencial para la supervivencia! Cuatro inadaptados – Garrett "The Garbage Man" Garrios (Jason Momoa), Henry (Sebastian Hansen), Natalie (Emma Myers) y Dawn (Danielle Brooks) – se encuentran luchando con problemas cotidianos cuando, de repente, son arrastrados a través de un misterioso portal hacia el Overworld: un extraño y cúbico mundo de las maravillas que prospera gracias a la imaginación. Para volver a casa, tendrán que dominar este mundo (y también protegerlo de cosas malvadas como Piglins y Zombis) mientras se embarcan en una búsqueda mágica con un artesano inesperado y experto, Steve (Jack Black). Juntos, su aventura los desafiará a ser audaces y a reconectar con las cualidades que hacen que cada uno de ellos sea excepcionalmente creativos… las mismas habilidades que necesitan para prosperar en el mundo real.

programme.title: Jurado Nº 2
programme.desc: While serving as a juror in a high profile murder trial, family man Justin Kemp finds himself struggling with a serious moral dilemma…one he could use to sway the jury verdict and potentially convict—or free—the accused killer.

programme.title: Los asesinatos de la tienda de yogur
programme.desc: In 1991, four teenage girls were brutally murdered at a frozen yogurt shop in Austin, Texas. What happened that night forever shook the Austin community and continues to mystify the police and haunt the families left in the wake of unthinkable loss.

programme.title: PECADORES
programme.desc: Three fraudsters, with false names, arrive at a strange town called "El Edén", in order to defraud the patriarch of a millionaire family.

programme.title: Liga de la Justicia
programme.desc: Superman, Batman, la mujer maravilla entre otros súper héroes que unen sus fuerzas para combatir las mayores amenazas.

programme.title: Una Película de Minecraft
programme.desc: Bienvenidos al mundo de Minecraft, donde la creatividad no solo te ayuda a crear, ¡sino que es esencial para la supervivencia! Cuatro inadaptados – Garrett "The Garbage Man" Garrios (Jason Momoa), Henry (Sebastian Hansen), Natalie (Emma Myers) y Dawn (Danielle Brooks) – se encuentran luchando con problemas cotidianos cuando, de repente, son arrastrados a través de un misterioso portal hacia el Overworld: un extraño y cúbico mundo de las maravillas que prospera gracias a la imaginación. Para volver a casa, tendrán que dominar este mundo (y también protegerlo de cosas malvadas como Piglins y Zombis) mientras se embarcan en una búsqueda mágica con un artesano inesperado y experto, Steve (Jack Black). Juntos, su aventura los desafiará a ser audaces y a reconectar con las cualidades que hacen que cada uno de ellos sea excepcionalmente creativos… las mismas habilidades que necesitan para prosperar en el mundo real.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: Ivy Morgan, a college student in New Orleans, falls for Ren Owens, the last person she expected to enter her rigidly controlled life.

programme.title: Talk to Me
programme.desc: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits using an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill, until one of them goes too far and unleashes terrifying supernatural forces.

programme.title: Marcial Maciel, el lobo de Dios
programme.desc: A docuseries that reveals the decades of abuse and deception of Father Marcial Maciel, the infamous leader of the Legionaries of Christ.

programme.title: La caída del halcón negro
programme.desc: When U.S. Rangers and an elite Delta Force team attempt to kidnap two underlings of a Somali warlord, their Black Hawk helicopters are shot down, and the Americans suffer heavy casualties, facing intense fighting from the militia on the ground.

programme.title: La supremacía Bourne
programme.desc: A CIA operation to purchase classified Russian documents is blown by a rival agent, who then shows up in the sleepy seaside village where Bourne and Marie have been living. The pair run for their lives and Bourne, who promised retaliation should anyone from his former life attempt contact, is forced to once again take up his life as a trained assassin to survive.

programme.title: 300: El Nacimiento de un Imperio
programme.desc: Luego de su victoria contra Leónidas, el ejército Persa bajo el comando del ahora convertido en Dios, Jerjes (Rodrigo Santoro) y Artemisia (Eva Green) – una vengativa comandante de la armada naval – planean tomar las mayores ciudades Griegas, la primera de ellas Atenas donde el almirante Temístocles (Sullivan Stapleton) y sus nuevos aliados deberán detener este supremo ataque.

programme.title: Aquaman y el Reino Perdido
programme.desc: Al no poder derrotar a Aquaman (Jason Momoa) la primera vez, Black Manta (Yahya Abdul-Mateen II), todavía impulsado por la necesidad de vengar la muerte de su padre, no se detendrá ante nada para acabar con Aquaman de una vez por todas. Esta vez Black Manta es más formidable que nunca y ejerce el poder del mítico Tridente Negro, que desata una fuerza antigua y malévola. Para derrotarlo, Aquaman recurrirá a su hermano encarcelado Orm (Patrick Wilson), el ex rey de la Atlántida, para forjar una alianza improbable. Juntos, deben dejar de lado sus diferencias para proteger su reino y salvar a la familia de Aquaman y al mundo de una destrucción irreversible.

programme.title: Rascacielos: Rescate en las Alturas
programme.desc: El ex líder del equipo de rescate de rehenes del FBI y veterano de guerra de Estados Unidos, Will Sawyer (Dwayne Johnson), que ahora evalúa la seguridad de los rascacielos. En una misión en China, encuentra el edificio más alto y seguro del mundo que se incendia repentinamente, y ha sido acusado por ello. Un hombre buscado huye y debe buscar a los responsables para limpiar su nombre y de alguna manera rescatar a su familia que está atrapada dentro del edificio… por encima de la línea de fuego.

programme.title: Romper el círculo
programme.desc: When a woman's first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship with a charming, but abusive neurosurgeon is upended, and she realizes she must learn to rely on her own strength to make an impossible choice for her future.

programme.title: Until Dawn: Noche de Terror
programme.desc: Un año después de la misteriosa desaparición de su hermana Melanie (Maia Mitchell), Clover (Ella Rubin) y sus amigos se dirigen al remoto valle donde despareció en busca de respuestas. Mientras exploran un centro de visitantes abandonado, son acechadas por un asesino enmascarado que las mata una a una de forma horrible… para después despertar y encontrarse de nuevo al principio de la misma noche. Atrapadas en el valle, se ven obligadas a revivir la historia una y otra vez, solo que cada vez la amenaza asesina es diferente y aún más aterradora que la anterior. Con la esperanza menguando, el grupo pronto se da cuenta de que solo les queda un número limitado de muertes y que la única forma de escapar es sobrevivir hasta el amanecer.

programme.title: La trampa
programme.desc: Many years ago, grandfather Noé built a fish trap. Hidden in the jungle, it is a lost legacy for the hunters of the Indigenous Okaina community. With the arrival of a mysterious jaguar, Noé’s ancestors take this signal and strive to rebuild what was lost.

programme.title: Aquaman y el Reino Perdido
programme.desc: Al no poder derrotar a Aquaman (Jason Momoa) la primera vez, Black Manta (Yahya Abdul-Mateen II), todavía impulsado por la necesidad de vengar la muerte de su padre, no se detendrá ante nada para acabar con Aquaman de una vez por todas. Esta vez Black Manta es más formidable que nunca y ejerce el poder del mítico Tridente Negro, que desata una fuerza antigua y malévola. Para derrotarlo, Aquaman recurrirá a su hermano encarcelado Orm (Patrick Wilson), el ex rey de la Atlántida, para forjar una alianza improbable. Juntos, deben dejar de lado sus diferencias para proteger su reino y salvar a la familia de Aquaman y al mundo de una destrucción irreversible.

programme.title: Compañera Perfecta
programme.desc: Tras una escapada de fin de semana, un hombre se está dando cuenta de que está perdiendo el control de su Androide y se está volviendo loca, sangrienta y violenta.

programme.title: Monkey Man: El Despertar de la Bestia
programme.desc: El nominado al Oscar Dev Patel logra un sorpréndete y espectacular debut como director con un film de acción sobre la búsqueda de venganza de un hombre contra los líderes corruptos que asesinaron a su madre y continúan victimizando sistemáticamente a los pobres y los impotentes.Inspirada en la leyenda de Hanuman, un ícono que encarna la fuerza y el coraje Monkey Man está protagonizado por Patel como Kid, un joven anónimo que se gana la vida a duras penas en un club de lucha clandestino donde, noche tras noche, con una máscara de gorila, es golpeado hasta sangrar por luchadores más populares por dinero en efectivo.Después de años de ira reprimida, Kid descubre una manera de infiltrarse en el enclave de la siniestra élite de la ciudad. A medida que el trauma de su infancia se desborda, sus manos misteriosamente llenas de cicatrices desatan una explosiva campaña y represalia para ajustar cuentas con los hombres que le quitaron todo.

programme.title: Corazones de hierro
programme.desc: April, 1945. As the Allies make their final push in the European Theatre, a battle-hardened army sergeant named Wardaddy commands a Sherman tank and her five-man crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Outnumbered and outgunned, and with a rookie soldier thrust into their platoon, Wardaddy and his men face overwhelming odds in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.

programme.title: La leyenda del zorro
programme.desc: Diego Vega returns from his study trip to discover his homeland is under the army's dictatorship. Diego, refusing to watch idly, disguises himself as Zorro to protect the weak and oppressed. Diego is not a coward but he is unable to win the affections of his sweetheart, Lolita, who is attracted to other more noble men. Diego serenades Lolita as Zorro and fights the evils of his homeland, hoping to capture her heart.

programme.title: Tornados
programme.desc: Chi-Chung Huang is the second son of the Huang family, which owns Taiwan Chao-Lian Group. Chi-Chung and his older brother, Chi-Long Huang, bribe the prosecutor for a death penalty case that his family is involved in. However, the prosecutor changes his mind about the matter. Chi-Chung leads his men to confront the prosecutor, who later falls off an elevated expressway and dies. To lay low for a while, Chi-Chung accepts his brother's arrangement and goes into hiding in the southern region of Taiwan. However, after he arrives there, he is controlled by a crime syndicate. After he is drugged and becomes hardly conscious, he inadvertently rapes Chia-Yi, who is a nice good girl. After the rape, Chia-Yi swears to get Chi-Chung to face up the legal consequences; later, she finds she is impregnated by Chi-Chung, and this strengthens her will to fight a battle between the rich (Chi-Chung) and the poor (herself). As a storm is quietly approaching, who will turn out to be the winner?

programme.title: Garfield: Fuera de Casa
programme.desc: Garfield (Chris Pratt), el famoso gato de casero amante de la lasaña que odia los lunes, está a punto de vivir una salvaje aventura al aire libre. Tras un inesperado reencuentro con su padre perdido hace mucho tiempo, el desaliñado gato callejero Vic (Samuel L. Jackson), Garfield y su amigo canino Odie se ven obligados a abandonar su mimada vida para unirse a Vic en un divertidísimo atraco de alto riesgo.

programme.title: Godzilla y Kong: El Nuevo Imperio
programme.desc: ¡La batalla épica continua! La película cinematografía Monsterverse de Legendary Pictures continúa el explosivo enfrentamiento de "Godzilla vs. Kong" con una aventura completamente nueva que enfrenta al todopoderoso Kong y al temible Godzilla contra una colosal amenaza no descubierta escondida dentro de nuestro mundo, desafiando su propia existencia – y la nuestra. "Godzilla x Kong: El Nuevo Imperio" profundiza en las historias de estos Titanes y sus orígenes, así como en los misterios de la Isla Calavera y más allá, mientras desenmascara la batalla mítica que ayudó a forjar a estos seres extraordinarios y los unió a la humanidad para siempre.

programme.title: Beekeeper: Sentencia de Muerte
programme.desc: En Beekeeper: Sentencia de muerte, la brutal campaña de venganza de un hombre adquiere un interés nacional después de que se revelara que es un ex agente de una organización poderosa y clandestina conocida como "Beekeepers".

programme.title: Escape bajo fuego
programme.desc: After his mission is exposed, an undercover CIA operative stuck deep in hostile territory in Afghanistan must fight his way out, alongside his Afghan translator, to an extraction point in Kandahar, all whilst avoiding elite enemy forces and foreign spies tasked with hunting them down.

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: Twisted Metal, una serie de televisión de acción en vivo de media hora basada en la clásica serie de juegos de PlayStation, es una comedia de acción de alto octanaje, basada en una toma original de Rhett Reese y Paul Wernick y escrita por Michael Jonathan Smith, acerca de un forastero con boca de motor al que se le ofrece la oportunidad de una vida mejor, pero solo si puede entregar con éxito un paquete misterioso a través de un terreno baldío postapocalíptico. Con la ayuda de un ladrón de autos que empuña un hacha, se enfrentará a merodeadores salvajes que conducen vehículos de destrucción y otros peligrosos de la carretera, incluido un payaso trastornado que conduce un camión de helados demasiado familiar.

programme.title: Moonfall
programme.desc: A mysterious force knocks the moon from its orbit around Earth and sends it hurtling on a collision course with life as we know it.

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: Twisted Metal, una serie de televisión de acción en vivo de media hora basada en la clásica serie de juegos de PlayStation, es una comedia de acción de alto octanaje, basada en una toma original de Rhett Reese y Paul Wernick y escrita por Michael Jonathan Smith, acerca de un forastero con boca de motor al que se le ofrece la oportunidad de una vida mejor, pero solo si puede entregar con éxito un paquete misterioso a través de un terreno baldío postapocalíptico. As a storm is quietly approaching, who will turn out to be the winner?

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Both a gift and a curse, Graham has the extraordinary ability to think like his prey—he sees what they see, feels what they feel. But while Graham is pursuing an especially troubling, cannibalistic murderer, Special Agent Jack Crawford teams him with a highly respected psychiatrist – a man with a taste for the criminal minded – Dr. Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Tres Reyes
programme.desc: A special connection between the acclaimed bolero trio and their fans is evident in this memorable concert performance. The "music of love" flows from Gilberto Puenta, Raul Puente and Hernando Avilez as they delight their audience with renditions of "Jacarandosa," "Mujeres Divinas" and "La Revancha." The evening event is capped off in a touching tribute to Selena when the group covers the late superstar's hit song "No Me Queda Mas."

programme.title: El Hombre Araña
programme.desc: Siendo un nerd y torpe por naturaleza, la vida de Peter Parker (Tobey Maguire) ha dado un giro inesperado cuando es mordido accidentalmente por una araña radiactiva. De la noche a la mañana Peter se transforma y es capaz de crear telarañas que son disparadas desde sus muñecas, la habilidad de adherirse a las paredes, fuerza increíble y un primordial sentido arácnido. Utilizando un traje hecho en casa, Peter está dispuesto a cambiar la vida que le rodea, sea como sea. Cuando un criminal asesina a su tío Ben, él descubre que “con un gran poder viene una gran responsabilidad”. Peter se convierte en un peleador contra el crimen conocido como El Hombre Araña.

programme.title: Agentes 355
programme.desc: Cuando un arma ultrasecreta cae en manos de mercenarios, el agente de la CIA Mason "Mace" Brown (Jessica Chastain) deberá unir fuerzas con la agente alemana Marie (Diane Kruger), la ex aliada del MI6 y especialista en informática de vanguardia Khadijah (Lupita Nyong'o), y la hábil psicóloga colombiana Graciela (Penélope Cruz) en una misión letal y vertiginosa para recuperarla, mientras que también se mantienen un paso por delante de una mujer misteriosa, Lin Mi Sheng (Fan Bingbing), que está siguiendo todos sus movimientos.A medida la acción se dispara por todo el mundo después los cafés de París a los mercados de Marruecos y las opulentas casas de subastas de Shanghái, el cuarteto de mujeres forjará una ligera lealtad que podría proteger al mundo o hacer que las maten.

programme.title: Batman vs Superman: El Origen de la Justicia
programme.desc: Temiendo que los actos de Superman (Henry Cavill) no sean castigados, Batman (Ben Affleck) carga contra Superman, mientras el mundo pelea con el tipo de héroe que el mundo en realidad necesita. Con Batman y Superman peleándose entre sí, una nueva amenaza llamada Doomsday, creada por Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) amenaza con destruir la humanidad. Ahora Batman y Superman deberán superar sus diferencias y unirse junto a la Mujer Maravilla (Gal Gadot) para detener la destrucción de Metrópolis ocasionada por Lex Luthor y Doomsday.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Basada en el extraordinario personaje de Charlie y la fábrica de chocolate, la joya de la corona de Roald Dahl y uno de los libros infantiles más vendidos de todos los tiempos, "Wonka" cuenta la maravillosa historia de cómo el mayor inventor del mundo, el mago y el chocolatero se convirtió en el querido Willy Wonka que conocemos hoy. Este espectáculo de la pantalla grande irresistiblemente vívido e inventivo presentará al público a un joven Willy Wonka (Timothée Chalamet), repleto de ideas y decidido a cambiar el mundo con un delicioso bocado a la vez – demostrando que las mejores cosas de la vida comienzan con un sueño, y si Tienes la suerte de conocer a Willy Wonka, todo es posible.

programme.title: Jurassic World: El Reino Caído
programme.desc: Han pasado cuatro años desde que el parque temático y complejo de lujo del Mundo Jurásico fue destruido por los dinosaurios fuera de su zona. La Isla Nublar ahora se encuentra abandonada por los humanos mientras los dinosaurios sobrevivientes se las arreglan por si solos en la jungla. Cuando el volcán inactivo de la isla comienza a rugir a la vida, Owen (Chris Pratt) y Claire (Bryce Dallas Howard) montan una campaña para rescatar a los dinosaurios restantes de este evento de extinción. Owen se siente impulsado a encontrar a Blue, su raptor líder quien todavía está desaparecida en la naturaleza y Claire ha tomado un mayor respeto por estas criaturas a las que ahora toma como misión. Al llegar a la isla inestable mientras la lava comienza a cubrir la isla, su expedición descubre una conspiración que podría volver todo nuestro planeta a un clima peligroso no visto desde la prehistoria.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: Madame Web cuenta la historia independiente del origen de una de las heroínas más enigmáticas de las publicaciones Marvel. El film de suspenso sigue a Cassandra Web (Dakota Johnson), una paramédica de Manhattan que desarrolla el poder de ver el futuro… y se da cuenta de que puede utilizar la visión para cambiarlo. Obligada a enfrentar revelaciones sobre su pasado, forja una relación con tres mujeres jóvenes vinculadas a destinos poderosos… si todas pueden sobrevivir a un presente mortal.

programme.title: Película
programme.desc: The Momonsters are spending their first vacation in a campsite in the middle of the forest! Exploring the nature, doing outdoor activities, telling stories around a campfire… Any child’s dream vacation. However, over their first night there, they find the diary of a previous camper stating that there’s a treasure hidden in the woods. “Super cool!” but it’s guarded by a scary ghost. “Not so cool…”

programme.title: Tarot de la Muerte
programme.desc: Cuando un grupo de amigos viola imprudentemente la regla sagrada de las lecturas del Tarot – nunca usar la baraja de otra persona – sin saberlo, desatan un mal indescriptible atrapado dentro de las cartas malditas. Uno a uno, se enfrentan al destino y acaban en una carrera contra la muerte para escapar del futuro predicho en sus lecturas.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Basada en el extraordinario personaje de Charlie y la fábrica de chocolate, la joya de la corona de Roald Dahl y uno de los libros infantiles más vendidos de todos los tiempos, "Wonka" cuenta la maravillosa historia de cómo el mayor inventor del mundo, el mago y el chocolatero se convirtió en el querido Willy Wonka que conocemos hoy. programme.title: Godzilla y Kong Nuevo Imperio
programme.desc: Following their explosive showdown, Godzilla and Kong must reunite against a colossal undiscovered threat hidden within our world, challenging their very existence – and our own.

programme.title: Compañera Perfecta
programme.desc: Tras una escapada de fin de semana, un hombre se está dando cuenta de que está perdiendo el control de su Androide y se está volviendo loca, sangrienta y violenta.

programme.title: El Primer Hombre en la Luna
programme.desc: La fascinante historia de la NASA de conseguir que un hombre aterrice en la luna, centrándose en Neil Armstrong (Ryan Gosling) y los años 1961 – 1969. Explora los sacrificios y el costo – en Armstrong y en la nación – de una de las misiones más peligrosas de la historia.

programme.title: Jurado Nº 2
programme.desc: While serving as a juror in a high profile murder trial, family man Justin Kemp finds himself struggling with a serious moral dilemma…one he could use to sway the jury verdict and potentially convict—or free—the accused killer.

programme.title: No descansarás
programme.desc: After struggling to start a family, Julie Rivers becomes pregnant and moves into a new home with her husband. She's ordered to mandatory bed rest, and begins seeing ghostly happenings throughout the house.

programme.title: No descansarás
programme.desc: After struggling to start a family, Julie Rivers becomes pregnant and moves into a new home with her husband. She's ordered to mandatory bed rest, and begins seeing ghostly happenings throughout the house.

programme.title: No descansarás
programme.desc: After struggling to start a family, Julie Rivers becomes pregnant and moves into a new home with her husband. She's ordered to mandatory bed rest, and begins seeing ghostly happenings throughout the house.

programme.title: No descansarás
programme.desc: After struggling to start a family, Julie Rivers becomes pregnant and moves into a new home with her husband. She's ordered to mandatory bed rest, and begins seeing ghostly happenings throughout the house.

programme.title: Agnelli
programme.desc: Documentary about the life of Giovanni "Gianni" Agnelli, an influential Italian industrialist and principal shareholder of Fiat.

programme.title: 537 votes
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the political machinations that led to the unprecedented, contested outcome of the 2000 presidential election, including the chaotic voter recount in Florida that ended with George W. Bush winning by a razor-thin margin.

programme.title: Siempre, Luis
programme.desc: A story that embodies the tenacity and passion of the American Dream, this documentary is a portrait of the pioneering activist Luis A. Miranda Jr. Luis is a decades-long fighter for Latino communities, a key player in the New York and national political arena, and a loving father of three – including the award-winning composer, lyricist and actor, Lin-Manuel Miranda.

programme.title: Jane Fonda en cinco actos
programme.desc: Girl next door, activist, so-called traitor, fitness tycoon, Oscar winner: Jane Fonda has lived a life of controversy, tragedy and transformation – and she’s done it all in the public eye. An intimate look at one woman’s singular journey.

programme.title: Claro de luna
programme.desc: Two twins fall in love with the same man and he thinks he only loves one woman.

programme.title: En la tormenta
programme.desc: In the storm is a Mexican film of the year 1980 directed by Fernando Vallejo. The film is about the time of La Violencia in Colombia. Vallejo wanted to make the film in Colombia, however he found numerous obstacles to film it in the country so he decided to do it in Mexico with Mexican actors and recreating the Colombian landscapes in that country.

programme.title: Ataque en el maratón
programme.desc: Recounts the dramatic story of the April 2013 terrorist attack at the Boston Marathon through the experiences of individuals whose lives were affected. Ranging from the events of the day to the death-penalty sentencing of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the film features surveillance footage, news clips, home movies and exclusive interviews with survivors and their families, as well as first responders, investigators, government officials and reporters from the Boston Globe, which won a Pulitzer Prize for its coverage of the bombing. In the wake of terrorism, a newlywed couple, a mother and daughter, and two brothers - all gravely injured by the blast - face the challenges of physical and emotional recovery as they and their families strive to reclaim their lives and communities.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of various guests and employees at an exclusive tropical resort over the span of a week as with each passing day, a darker complexity emerges in these picture-perfect travelers, the hotel’s cheerful employees and the idyllic locale itself.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of various guests and employees at an exclusive tropical resort over the span of a week as with each passing day, a darker complexity emerges in these picture-perfect travelers, the hotel’s cheerful employees and the idyllic locale itself.

programme.desc: Follow the exploits of various guests and employees at an exclusive tropical resort over the span of a week as with each passing day, a darker complexity emerges in these picture-perfect travelers, the hotel’s cheerful employees and the idyllic locale itself.

programme.title: Detrás del candelabro
programme.desc: Based on the autobiographical novel, the tempestuous 6-year relationship between Liberace and his (much younger) lover, Scott Thorson, is recounted.

programme.title: Breslin y Hamill Las voces
programme.desc: Directors Jonathan Alter, John Block and Steve McCarthy bring New York columnists Jimmy Breslin and Pete Hamill’s courageous writing to life, celebrating the acclaimed journalists and the city they loved.

programme.title: Loco, no demente
programme.desc: Fascinated by the human brain and its capacity for ruthlessness, psychiatrist Dr. Dorothy Otnow Lewis has spent her life investigating the interior lives of violent people. With each case, she came closer to developing a unified field theory of what makes a killer. Along the way - steering away from the conventional wisdom of her colleagues - she explored the world of multiple personality disorder.

programme.title: Foster Adoptados por
programme.desc: With one in eight American children suffering a confirmed case of neglect or abuse by age 18, there are currently more than 400,000 children in foster care in the U.S., a number that continues to grow each year. Drawing on unprecedented access, FOSTER explores the often-misunderstood world of foster care through compelling stories from the Los Angeles County Department of Children and Family Services, the largest county child welfare agency in the country.

programme.title: Y2K Bomba de Tiempo
programme.desc: As the clock counted down to the the 21st century, the world faced a potential technological disaster: a bug that could cause computers to misinterpret the year 2000 as 1900. Crafted entirely from archival footage and featuring first-hand accounts from computer experts, survivalists, scholars, militia groups, conservative Christians, and pop icons, Time Bomb Y2K is a prescient and often humorous tale about the power and vulnerabilities of technology.

programme.title: Mala educación
programme.desc: An examination on the effect of Franco-era religious schooling and sexual abuse on the lives of two longtime friends.

programme.title: Me Gusta.Comparto.Sigo
programme.desc: Garrett is a rising YouTube star. Shell is a deeply emotional fan. When they begin a romantic relationship, he's forced to question whether opening your life to strangers online is an invitation to community and rescue... or to stalking, obsession and madness.

programme.title: Confirmación
programme.desc: A divorced father reconnects with his son when they track down a stolen toolbox over the course of a weekend.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of various guests and employees at an exclusive tropical resort over the span of a week as with each passing day, a darker complexity emerges in these picture-perfect travelers, the hotel’s cheerful employees and the idyllic locale itself.

programme.desc: Follow the exploits of various guests and employees at an exclusive tropical resort over the span of a week as with each passing day, a darker complexity emerges in these picture-perfect travelers, the hotel’s cheerful employees and the idyllic locale itself.

programme.title: Bessie
programme.desc: The story of legendary blues performer, Bessie Smith, who rose to fame during the 1920s and '30s.

programme.title: Looking The Movie
programme.desc: Patrick returns to San Francisco for the first time in almost a year to celebrate a momentous event with his old friends. In the process, he must face the unresolved relationships he left behind and make difficult choices about what’s important to him.

programme.title: Cómo ser Warren Buffett
programme.desc: The story of the evolution of a boy from Nebraska who became one of the most respected men in the world, and the heroes who helped guide him along the way. By allowing access to his life and never-before-released home videos, Buffett offers a glimpse into his unique mind to help us understand what is truly important when money no longer has meaning.

programme.title: United Skates
programme.desc: When America's last standing roller rinks are threatened with closure, a community of thousands battle in a racially charged environment to save an underground subculture.

programme.title: Super/Man La historia de
programme.desc: Christopher Reeve portrayed the Man of Steel in four Superman films and played dozens of other roles that displayed his talent and range as an actor, before being injured in a near-fatal horse-riding accident in 1995 that left him paralyzed from the neck down. After becoming a quadriplegic, he became a charismatic leader and activist in the quest to find a cure for spinal cord injuries, as well as a passionate advocate for disability rights and care.

programme.title: Diva por siempre
programme.desc: Based on the life stories of the eccentric aunt and first cousin of Jackie Onassis raised as Park Avenue débutantes but who withdrew from New York society, taking shelter at their Long Island summer home, "Grey Gardens." As their wealth and contact with the outside world dwindled, so did their grasp on reality.

programme.title: Temple grandin
programme.desc: A biopic of Temple Grandin, an autistic woman who has become one of the top scientists in the humane livestock handling industry.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of various guests and employees at an exclusive tropical resort over the span of a week as with each passing day, a darker complexity emerges in these picture-perfect travelers, the hotel’s cheerful employees and the idyllic locale itself.
