programme.desc: Follow the exploits of various guests and employees at an exclusive tropical resort over the span of a week as with each passing day, a darker complexity emerges in these picture-perfect travelers, the hotel’s cheerful employees and the idyllic locale itself.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of various guests and employees at an exclusive tropical resort over the span of a week as with each passing day, a darker complexity emerges in these picture-perfect travelers, the hotel’s cheerful employees and the idyllic locale itself.

programme.title: Mentiroso, Mentiroso
programme.desc: Mentiroso, a period piece set in a small Mexican town, is a coming-of-age story about a boy who tells his friends that he can get a nude photograph of a beautiful girl.

programme.title: Las Momias y el Anillo Perdido
programme.desc: En Egipto, en las profundidades de la tierra, hay una ciudad de momias que data de hace 3000 años. Por mandato imperial, la princesa Nefer (Eleanor Tomlinson) tiene que casarse con Thut (Joe Thomas), pero ninguno de los dos, quiere hacerlo: Nefer anhela la libertad y Thut es alérgico al compromiso. Pero al mandato de los dioses son ineludibles, y ahora Thut tendrá que casarse con Nefer en tan sólo siete días, llevando a la boda al antiguo anillo que le ha regalado el faraón.Mientras tanto, en la superficie de la tierra, Lord Silvester Carnaby (Hugh Bonneville) lleva a cabo una expedición arqueológica en la que, por primera vez, encuentra algo relevante: una tumba egipcia donde además de varios tesoros, encuentra una alianza. Es su oportunidad de pasar a la historia y hacer realidad su sueño, pero no tienen en cuenta que ese anillo ya tiene un dueño…Cuando Thut descubre que le han robado el anillo, no tiene más remedio que subir al mundo humano e infiltrarse en el Londres actual. Le acompaña su hermano pequeño Sekhem (Santiago Winder), un niño de ocho años que quiere recuperar el estatus de héroe de carreras de Thut; y Croc, un bebé cocodrilo y mascota de Sekhem; así como también Nefer, que aprovecha la oportunidad de huir del matrimonio y perseguir sus sueños. Juntas, las tres momias tendrán que navegar por el Londres actual, recuperar el anillo que Lord Silvester Carnaby ha robado y, algo que no estaba en los planes de Thut y Nefer, aprender a quererse.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Peter Pan is an adolescent boy who has escaped from his parents to the dreamland of Nowhere. Peter is determined to remain a little boy forever; because the adult world does not please him at all. Together with the fairy Tinkerbell, Peter Pan lures the girl Wendy and her two brothers John and Michael to Nowhere, where Peter teaches them to fly. They join forces with the Indians, led by the beautiful Tigerlilly, to fight together against the evil Captain Jack Haken and his wild pirates.

programme.title: Angry Birds La Película
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine.

programme.title: Karate kid
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, kung fu prodigy Li Fong is uprooted from his home in Beijing and forced to move to New York City with his mother. When a new friend needs his help, Li enters a karate competition – but his skills alone aren't enough. Li's kung fu teacher Mr. Han enlists original Karate Kid Daniel LaRusso for help, and Li learns a new way to fight, merging their two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: Cómo Entrenar a tu Dragón 2
programme.desc: Han pasado 5 años desde que Hipo y Chimuelo han creado en la isla de Berk una unión fuerte entre dragones y Vikingos. Mientras Astrid, Patán y el resto del grupo compiten en las carreras de dragones – nuevo deporte de la isla – llegan a una caverna secreta en el hielo, hogar de cientos de dragones comandados por el Jinete del Dragón. Ahora los dos nuevos grupos deberán enfrentar al nuevo enemigo que planea con tomar el poder de todos los dragones.

programme.title: ¡Patos!
programme.desc: An excited Mari Carmen starts her first day at work at the International Sales Office, but not everything will go as she expects. A duck has appeared in the balcony calling everyone’s attention and turning upside down the day that Mari Carmen wanted to have a fresh start.

programme.title: Paddington Aventura en
programme.desc: Paddington travels to Peru to visit his beloved Aunt Lucy, who now resides at the Home for Retired Bears. With the Brown Family in tow, a thrilling adventure ensues when a mystery plunges them into an unexpected journey through the Amazon rainforest and up to the mountain peaks of Peru.

programme.title: Angry Birds La Película
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine.

programme.title: Karate kid
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, kung fu prodigy Li Fong is uprooted from his home in Beijing and forced to move to New York City with his mother. When a new friend needs his help, Li enters a karate competition – but his skills alone aren't enough. Li's kung fu teacher Mr. Han enlists original Karate Kid Daniel LaRusso for help, and Li learns a new way to fight, merging their two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: La casa con un reloj en sus
programme.desc: When ten-year-old Lewis is suddenly orphaned, he is sent to live with his Uncle Jonathan in a creaky (and creepy) old mansion with a mysterious ticking noise that emanates from the walls. Upon discovering that his uncle is a warlock, Lewis begins learning magic, but when he rebelliously resurrects an evil warlock he must find the secret of the house and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Scooby doo 2
programme.desc: Nobody vacations like Scooby-Doo and the gang. This is arm-scare travel at its very best! And with 13 hair-raising vacation destinations on two DVDs, that’s hours of family fun. Get ready to get shipwrecked in the Bermuda Triangle with scary skeleton scuba divers and chased through the canals of Venice by the Ghostly Gondolier, who even kidnaps Daphne! Hop aboard a haunted Aztec barge, but not before Scooby-Doo wows a vengeful god with his Mexican hat dance – to say nothing of his airplane cha-cha over the headhunter-happy jungles of Brazil. Along the way you can bet the Mystery Inc. gang will get to the bottom of each mystery with plenty of “zoinks!” (the same in every language), plenty of hijinks and a whole lot of international cuisine – leaning tower of pizza anyone?

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Peter Pan is an adolescent boy who has escaped from his parents to the dreamland of Nowhere. Peter is determined to remain a little boy forever; because the adult world does not please him at all. Together with the fairy Tinkerbell, Peter Pan lures the girl Wendy and her two brothers John and Michael to Nowhere, where Peter teaches them to fly. They join forces with the Indians, led by the beautiful Tigerlilly, to fight together against the evil Captain Jack Haken and his wild pirates.

programme.title: Cómo Entrenar a tu Dragón 2
programme.desc: Han pasado 5 años desde que Hipo y Chimuelo han creado en la isla de Berk una unión fuerte entre dragones y Vikingos. Mientras Astrid, Patán y el resto del grupo compiten en las carreras de dragones – nuevo deporte de la isla – llegan a una caverna secreta en el hielo, hogar de cientos de dragones comandados por el Jinete del Dragón. Ahora los dos nuevos grupos deberán enfrentar al nuevo enemigo que planea con tomar el poder de todos los dragones.

programme.title: Lego Batman: La Película
programme.desc: Bruno (Will Arnett) es el excéntrico súper héroe de Ciudad Gótica, cuando regresa a la baticueva, Alfred (Ralph Fiennes) le recuerda que él no solo debe combatir el crimen de la ciudad si no también formar una familia y este le recuerda que tiene que educar al joven Ricardo Tapia (Michael Cera). Pero hay grandes riesgos en la Ciudad Gótica y si él desea salvar la ciudad de él Guasón (Zach Galifianakis), Batman podría dejar de ser el vigilante solitario, tratando de trabajar con otros y quizás, tal vez, aprender a soltarse un poco.

programme.title: Karate kid
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, kung fu prodigy Li Fong is uprooted from his home in Beijing and forced to move to New York City with his mother. When a new friend needs his help, Li enters a karate competition – but his skills alone aren't enough. Li's kung fu teacher Mr. Han enlists original Karate Kid Daniel LaRusso for help, and Li learns a new way to fight, merging their two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: Los Croods
programme.desc: Los croods son la primera familia del mundo que viven protegidos en una cueva hasta que un día un terrible terremoto la destruye y ellos se ven forzados a abandonarla y se aventuran a un nuevo lugar con criaturas fabulosas y paisajes espectaculares donde deberán encontrar una nueva cueva para vivir.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Welcome to Hotel Transylvania, Dracula's lavish five-stake resort, where monsters and their families can live it up and no humans are allowed. One special weekend, Dracula has invited all his best friends to celebrate his beloved daughter Mavis's 118th birthday. For Dracula catering to all of these legendary monsters is no problem but the party really starts when one ordinary guy stumbles into the hotel and changes everything!

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: When the old-old-old-fashioned vampire Vlad arrives at the hotel for an impromptu family get-together, Hotel Transylvania is in for a collision of supernatural old-school and modern day cool.

programme.title: Robot Salvaje
programme.desc: La aventura épica sigue el viaje de un robot – unidad ROZZUM 7134, "Roz" (Lupita Nyong'o) para abreviar – que naufraga en una isla deshabitada y debe aprender a adaptarse al duro entorno, construyendo gradualmente relaciones con los animales de la isla y convirtiéndose en el padre adoptivo de un ganso huérfano.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: Después de tres aventuras desafiando a la muerte y derrotando a villanos de clase mundial con su incomparable coraje y sus alocadas habilidades en las artes marciales, Po (Jack Black), el Guerrero Dragón, es llamado por el destino para… tomarse un descanso. Específicamente, se le pide que se convierta en el líder espiritual del Valle de la Paz.Esto plantea un par de problemas obvios. En primer lugar, Po sabe tanto de liderazgo espiritual como de dieta paleo, y en segundo lugar, necesita encontrar y entrenar rápidamente a un nuevo Guerrero Dragón antes de poder asumir su nuevo y elevado cargo.Y lo peor, recientemente se ha avistado a una malévola y poderosa hechicera, La Camaleona (Viola Davis), una pequeña reptil que puede transformarse en cualquier criatura, grande o pequeña. Y La Camaleona ha puesto sus avariciosos y brillantes ojos en el Bastón de la Sabiduría de Po, que le daría el poder de volver a convocar a todos los maestros villanos que Po ha derrotado en el reino de los espíritus.Po necesitará ayuda. La encontrará en la forma de la astuta y rápida ladrona Zhen (Awkwafina), una zorra ladrona que sorprende a Po, pero cuyas habilidades resultarán inestimables. En su empeño por proteger el Valle de la Paz de las garras reptilianas de La Camaleona, este cómico dúo tendrá que trabajar en equipo. En el proceso, Po descubrirá que los héroes pueden encontrarse en los lugares más inesperados.

programme.title: La brújula dorada
programme.desc: After overhearing a shocking secret, precocious orphan Lyra Belacqua trades her carefree existence roaming the halls of Jordan College for an otherworldly adventure in the far North, unaware that it's part of her destiny.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

programme.title: Un lugar llamado Notting Hill
programme.desc: London bookstore owner William Thacker's quiet life turns upside down when a chance encounter with famous actress Anna Scott sparks an unlikely romance challenged by their vastly different worlds.

programme.title: 10.000 A.C
programme.desc: A prehistoric epic that follows a young mammoth hunter's journey through uncharted territory to secure the future of his tribe.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Welcome to Hotel Transylvania, Dracula's lavish five-stake resort, where monsters and their families can live it up and no humans are allowed. One special weekend, Dracula has invited all his best friends to celebrate his beloved daughter Mavis's 118th birthday. For Dracula catering to all of these legendary monsters is no problem but the party really starts when one ordinary guy stumbles into the hotel and changes everything!

programme.title: Las aventuras del niño tiburón
programme.desc: Everyone always knew that Max had a wild imagination, but no one believed that his wildest creations -- a boy raised by watchful great white sharks and a girl with the force of a volcano -- were real. Now, these two pint-sized action masters will show Max that even an ordinary kid has what it takes to be extraordinary.

programme.title: El Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch hatches a scheme to ruin Christmas when the residents of Whoville plan their annual holiday celebration.

programme.title: Los Pingüinos de Madagascar
programme.desc: Los equipos de súper espías no nacen, se encuban. Descubre los secretos de los más grandes y divertidos pájaros encubiertos del espionaje mundial. En esta nueva aventura de nuestros conocidos agentes: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico y Cabo deberán salvar al mundo del villano Dr. Octavius Brine, quien planea destruir la tierra tal y como la conocemos.

programme.title: Las Chicas Superpoderosas
programme.desc: The Powerpuff Girls is a animated television series about Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup, three kindergarten-aged girls with superpowers, as well as their "father", the brainy scientist Professor Utonium, who all live in the fictional city of Townsville, USA. The girls are frequently called upon by the town's childlike and naive mayor to help fight nearby criminals using their powers.

programme.title: Karate kid
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, kung fu prodigy Li Fong is uprooted from his home in Beijing and forced to move to New York City with his mother. When a new friend needs his help, Li enters a karate competition – but his skills alone aren't enough. Li's kung fu teacher Mr. Han enlists original Karate Kid Daniel LaRusso for help, and Li learns a new way to fight, merging their two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: La vida secreta
programme.desc: Do you have a hard time understanding why you think or behave the way you do? Don't worry, your mind can be a... complicated place. Discover its secrets with Ceri and solve the greatest mystery in the universe: why you are the way you are.

programme.title: Robot Salvaje
programme.desc: La aventura épica sigue el viaje de un robot – unidad ROZZUM 7134, "Roz" (Lupita Nyong'o) para abreviar – que naufraga en una isla deshabitada y debe aprender a adaptarse al duro entorno, construyendo gradualmente relaciones con los animales de la isla y convirtiéndose en el padre adoptivo de un ganso huérfano.

programme.title: ¡Patos!
programme.desc: An excited Mari Carmen starts her first day at work at the International Sales Office, but not everything will go as she expects. A duck has appeared in the balcony calling everyone’s attention and turning upside down the day that Mari Carmen wanted to have a fresh start.

programme.title: Posesión Infernal
programme.desc: Ida and Albin are a happy couple. They set off to a cabin in the vast Swedish woodlands to have a fun holiday with their friends. But under the floorboards is an evil that waits to be unleashed.

programme.title: Van Helsing: El Cazador de Monstruos
programme.desc: Cuando El Vaticano se entera de los maléficos planes del Conde Drácula (Richard Roxburgh) deciden envían a su mejor hombre, Van Helsing (Hugh Jackman) – el cazador de monstruos más temido del mundo – a Transilvania para investigar a Drácula en que planea utilizar los hallazgos del Doctor Frankenstein.

programme.title: Van Helsing: El Cazador de Monstruos
programme.desc: Cuando El Vaticano se entera de los maléficos planes del Conde Drácula (Richard Roxburgh) deciden envían a su mejor hombre, Van Helsing (Hugh Jackman) – el cazador de monstruos más temido del mundo – a Transilvania para investigar a Drácula en que planea utilizar los hallazgos del Doctor Frankenstein.

programme.title: Joker Folie a Deux
programme.desc: While struggling with his dual identity, Arthur Fleck not only stumbles upon true love, but also finds the music that's always been inside him.

programme.title: Night Shift
programme.desc: The stories of the men and women who work the overnight shift at San Antonio Memorial Hospital. They are an irreverent and special breed, particularly adrenaline junkie T.C. Callahan.

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Casi 5000 años después de que los dioses antiguos le confirieran los poderes todopoderosos y lo encarcelaran con la misma rapidez – Black Adam (Dwayne Johnson) es liberado de su tumba terrenal, listo para desatar su forma única de justicia en el mundo moderno.

programme.title: El exorcista El comienzo
programme.desc: Years before Father Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil’s soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa.

programme.title: Cazafantasmas
programme.desc: City Hall functionary takes responsibility for training a bunch of bozos as bicycle cops. Meanwhile, a different bunch of bozos is dressing up as ghosts and bothering people.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: En Ghostbusters: Apocalipsis Fantasma, la familia Spengler regresa al lugar donde comenzó todo, la icónica estación de bomberos de la ciudad de Nueva York, para formar equipo con los Cazafantasmas originales, quienes han desarrollado un laboratorio de investigación ultrasecreto para llevar la caza de fantasmas al siguiente nivel. Pero cuando el descubrimiento de un antiguo artefacto desata un ejército de fantasmas que arroja un escalofrío mortal sobre la ciudad, los Cazafantasmas nuevos y antiguos deben unir fuerzas para proteger su hogar y salvar al mundo de una segunda Edad de Hielo.

programme.title: El sorprendente Hombre Araña 2 La venganza de Electro
Halloween
programme.desc: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween Night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

programme.title: Universal Basic Guys
programme.desc: Two brothers lose their jobs to automation and are given $3,000 a month in a new basic income program, allowing them to use their free time and free money to find purpose in a world where they're no longer needed.

programme.title: Batman inicia
programme.desc: Driven by tragedy, billionaire Bruce Wayne dedicates his life to uncovering and defeating the corruption that plagues his home, Gotham City. Unable to work within the system, he instead creates a new identity, a symbol of fear for the criminal underworld - The Batman.

programme.title: Universal Basic Guys
programme.desc: Two brothers lose their jobs to automation and are given $3,000 a month in a new basic income program, allowing them to use their free time and free money to find purpose in a world where they're no longer needed.

programme.title: Pecados capitales
programme.desc: Evaristo Salinas is a successful businessman in his old age but knows he will die and decides to build a game between his family to see who is worthy of his inheritance. Each member of the Salinas family will be a cardinal sin.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Duna: Parte Dos explora el viaje mítico de Paul Atreides (Timothée Chalamet) mientras se une a Chani (Zendaya) y los Fremen en una guerra de venganza contra los conspiradores que destruyeron a su familia. Al enfrentarse a una elección entre el amor de su vida y el destino del universo conocido, Paul se esfuerza por evitar un futuro terrible que solo él puede prever.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kraven El Cazador es la visceral historia de cómo y por qué surgió uno de los villanos más emblemáticos de Marvel. Aaron Taylor-Johnson interpreta al personaje principal en esta película para adultos, ambientada antes de su famosa venganza contra Spider-Man.

programme.title: La chica de la capa roja
programme.desc: Valerie is in love with a brooding outsider, Peter, but her parents have arranged for her to marry another man. Unwilling to lose each other, Valerie and Peter plan to run away together when Valerie's older sister is killed by a werewolf that prowls the dark forest surrounding their village. Panic grips the town as Valerie discovers that she has a unique connection to the beast--one that inexorably draws them together, making her both suspect ... and bait.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2159, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth. Secretary Rhodes, a hard line government ofﬁcial, will stop at nothing to enforce anti-immigration laws and preserve the luxurious lifestyle of the citizens of Elysium. That doesn’t stop the people of Earth from trying to get in, by any means they can. When unlucky Max is backed into a corner, he agrees to take on a daunting mission that, if successful, will not only save his life, but could bring equality to these polarized worlds.

programme.title: Beetlejuice 2
programme.desc: ¡Beetlejuice ha vuelto! Después de una tragedia familiar inesperada, tres generaciones de la familia Deetz regresan a su hogar en Winter River. La vida de Lydia (Winona Ryder), que sigue atormentada por Beetlejuice (Michael Keaton), da un vuelco cuando su rebelde hija adolescente, Astrid (Jenna Ortega), descubre la misteriosa maqueta de la ciudad en el ático y el portal al más allá se abre accidentalmente. Con problemas gestándose en ambos reinos, es sólo cuestión de tiempo hasta que alguien diga el nombre de Beetlejuice tres veces y el travieso demonio regrese para desatar su propio caos.

programme.title: Evil Dead Rise
programme.desc: Trasladando la acción de los bosques a la ciudad, "Evil Dead: El Despertar" cuenta la retorcida historia de dos hermanas distanciadas, cuyo reencuentro se ve truncado por la aparición de demonios poseedores de carne, lo que las empuja a una batalla primordial por la supervivencia mientras se enfrentan a la versión más pesadillesca imaginable de la familia.

programme.title: Distant
programme.desc: A misfit illegal immigrant working two jobs is pushed into a corner by the deteriorating health of his mother back in India.

programme.title: Universal Basic Guys
programme.desc: Two brothers lose their jobs to automation and are given $3,000 a month in a new basic income program, allowing them to use their free time and free money to find purpose in a world where they're no longer needed.

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: A young artist gets stranded in an extensive, immaculate forest in western Ireland, where, after finding shelter, she becomes trapped alongside three strangers, stalked by mysterious creatures each night.

programme.title: Estado de fúria
programme.desc: Five women face extreme situations that will unleash their rage.

programme.title: Nebraska
programme.desc: An aging, booze-addled father takes a trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim what he believes to be a million-dollar sweepstakes prize.

programme.title: Dracula
programme.desc: The mysterious Professor Dreshko teaches Anatomy at the Faculty of Medicine. During an exam, he discovers among the students a blonde girl with light eyes and curly hair who reminds him of an old flame. She is Lourdes, the daughter of the rector of the university and she is about to get married.

programme.title: Wicked Little Letters
programme.desc: When the denizens of Littlehampton – including conservative Edith – begin receiving letters full of hilarious profanities, rowdy Irish migrant Rose is charged with the crime. Suspecting something amiss, the town's women band together to investigate.

programme.title: Alimañas
programme.desc: The story of a mother who does not want to die and a pair of ruinous children who only think about inheriting.

programme.title: Infamous
programme.desc: While researching his novel "In Cold Blood", Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.

programme.title: El Exorcista
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes retrospective made for the twenty-fifth anniversary of the classic horror film, The Exorcist. Includes interviews with Linda Blair and the other stars of the film, along with commentary from the director and writer on some of the deeper meanings behind the elements they used to terrify their audiences, and previously unreleased footage including make-up tests and deleted scenes.

programme.title: Ella
programme.desc: Es el año 2025, Theodore Twombly (Joaquin Phoenix) es un hombre solitario e introvertido que trabaja para una compañía que contrata escritores profesionales que escriben cartas amorosas para personas que no son capaces de hacerlo por ellos mismos. Infeliz luego de haberse divorciado de su amor platónico de su infancia, Catherine (Rooney Mara), Theodore compra un sistema operativo parlante con lo último en inteligencia artificial diseñado para adaptarse a sus necesidades y aprender de su dueño. Ahora su nuevo sistema operativo llamado por ella misma como “Samantha” (Scarlett Johansson) él aprenderá muchas cosas gracias a la omnipresencia de su nuevo software parlante.

programme.title: El Crimen del Padre Amaro
programme.desc: Sent to Mexico to help take care of aging Father Benito, young Father Amaro faces a moral challenge when he meets a 16-year-old girl who he starts an affair with. Likewise, the girl's mother had been having an affair with Father Benito. Father Amaro must choose between a holy or sinful life.

programme.title: El Buen Mentiroso
programme.desc: El estafador profesional Roy Courtnay (Ian McKellen) apenas puede creer su suerte cuando se encuentra con la viuda adinerada Betty McLeish (Helen Mirren) en línea. Cuando Betty le abre su hogar y su vida, Roy se sorprende al descubrir que se preocupa por ella, convirtiendo lo que debería ser una estafa cortada y seca en el camino de la cuerda floja más traicionero de su vida.

programme.title: El llanto
programme.desc: Andrea, in search of her biological family, feels stalked by an invisible threat. Other women before them have suffered the same fate. Twenty years earlier, on the other side of the world, Camille, fascinated by Marie, tries to warn her of a threat hanging over her.

programme.title: El Juez
programme.desc: In the Old West, a gunfighter punishes the wrongdoers making justice himself but his mother's words continue to fill his mind: "Justice is divine". Nonetheless, he goes on hanging the culprits, becoming quite famous. When a bunch ...

programme.title: Waltz with bashir
programme.desc: An Israeli film director interviews fellow veterans of the 1982 invasion of Lebanon to reconstruct his own memories of his term of service in that conflict.

programme.title: Frankenstein
programme.desc: Adaptation of Mary Shelley's novel about a scientist who brings life to a creature fashioned from corpses and various body parts.

programme.title: The American Joika
programme.desc: American ballet dancer Joy Womack is accepted into Moscow's infamously tough Bolshoi Ballet Academy, with the dream of becoming a great ballerina.

programme.title: Enseñanza de vida
programme.desc: Despite her sheltered upbringing, Jenny is a teen with a bright future; she's smart, pretty, and has aspirations of attending Oxford University. When David, a charming but much older suitor, motors into her life in a shiny automobile, Jenny gets a taste of adult life that she won't soon forget.

programme.title: Whiplash
programme.desc: Whiplash is a British/Australian television series made by the Seven Network and ATV and ITC Entertainment. Filmed in 1959-60, the series was first broadcast in September 1960 in the United Kingdom followed by Australia in February 1961 and had opening titles featuring the Australian locale and terrain and a dozen wild kangaroos as a Cobb & Co stage passed pulled by a team of five horses driven by Cobb himself.

programme.title: El Triángulo de la Tristeza
programme.desc: En esta divertidísima película de Ruben Östlund, ganador de la Palma de Oro, la jerarquía social se pone patas arriba, revelando la escandalosa relación entre poder y belleza. Carl (Harris Dickinson) y Yaya (Charlbi Dean), una pareja de modelos famosos, son invitados a un crucero de lujo para súper ricos, capitaneado por un desquiciado capitán de barco (Woody Harrelson). Lo que al principio parecía instagrameable acaba de forma catastrófica, dejando a los supervivientes varados en una isla desierta y luchando por la supervivencia.

programme.title: Kneecap
programme.desc: When fate brings Belfast teacher JJ into the orbit of self-confessed "low life scum" Naoise and Liam Óg, the needle drops on a hip-hop act like no other. Rapping in their native Irish, they lead a movement to save their mother tongue.

programme.title: Vi el brillo del televisor
programme.desc: Teenager Owen is just trying to make it through life in the suburbs when his classmate Maddy introduces him to a mysterious TV show — a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen’s view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: Cabo de miedo
programme.desc: Sam Bowden is a small-town corporate attorney. Max Cady is a tattooed, cigar-smoking, Bible-quoting, psychotic rapist. What do they have in common? 14 years ago, Sam was a public defender assigned to Max Cady's rape trial, and he made a serious error: he hid a document from his illiterate client that could have gotten him acquitted. Now, the cagey Cady has been released, and he intends to teach Sam Bowden and his family a thing or two about loss.

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: En el Hollywood de los años 80, Maxine Minx (Mia Goth), estrella de cine para adultos y aspirante a actriz, finalmente consigue su gran oportunidad. Pero mientras un misterioso asesino acecha a las estrellas de Hollywood, un rastro de sangre amenaza con revelar su siniestro pasado.

programme.title: Pieza por pieza
programme.desc: A unique cinematic experience that invites audiences on a vibrant journey through the life of cultural icon Pharrell Williams. Told through the lens of LEGO® animation, turn up the volume on your imagination and witness the evolution of one of music's most innovative minds.

programme.title: Uno de esos días
programme.desc: Best friends and roommates Dreux and Alyssa are about to have One of Them Days. When they discover Alyssa’s boyfriend has blown their rent money, the duo finds themselves going to extremes in a comical race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Todo, en todas partes
programme.desc: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save what's important to her by connecting with the lives she could have led in other universes.

programme.title: Frozen river
programme.desc: After her husband deserts her, working-class mother Ray Eddy is in great need of money to find a home. Lured by the possibility of easy cash, she joins Lila, a widowed Mohawk who earns a living by smuggling immigrants from Canada to the U.S. across the St. Lawrence.

programme.title: The Wolf Man
programme.desc: After his brother's death, Larry Talbot returns home to his father and the family estate. Events soon take a turn for the worse when Larry is bitten by a werewolf.

programme.title: The Front Room
programme.desc: Everything goes to hell for newly-pregnant Belinda after her mother-in-law moves in. As the diabolical guest tries to get her claws on the child, Belinda must draw the line somewhere.

programme.title: Petite maman
programme.desc: After the death of her beloved grandmother, eight-year-old Nelly meets a strangely familiar girl her own age in the woods. Instantly forming a connection with this mysterious new friend, Nelly embarks on a fantastical journey of discovery which helps her come to terms with this newfound loss.

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: Maggie's plan to have a baby on her own with a sperm donor is derailed when she falls in love with John, an older married professor, destroying his volatile marriage to the brilliant and impossible Georgette. But three years later, married to John with one daughter, Maggie is out of love and in a quandary: what do you do when you suspect your man and his ex-wife are actually perfect for each other?

programme.title: Priscilla
programme.desc: Cuando la adolescente Priscila Beaulieu (Cailee Spaeny) conoce a Elvis Presley (Jacob Elordi) en una fiesta, el hombre que ya es una superestrella meteórica del rock and roll se convierte en alguien completamente inesperado en los momentos privados: un enamoramiento emocionante, un aliado en la soledad, un mejor amigo vulnerable. A través de los ojos de Priscilla, Sofia Coppola cuenta el lado invisible de un gran mito americano en el largo noviazgo y el turbulento matrimonio de Elvis y Priscilla, desde una base militar alemana hasta su finca de ensueño en Graceland, en este retrato de amor, fantasía y fama profundamente sentido y detallado.

programme.title: Mi nombre era Eileen
programme.desc: During a bitter 1964 Massachusetts winter, young secretary Eileen becomes enchanted by Rebecca, the glamorous new counselor at the prison where she works. Their budding friendship takes a twisted turn when Rebecca reveals a dark secret — throwing Eileen onto a sinister path.

programme.title: Estado de fúria
programme.desc: Five women face extreme situations that will unleash their rage.

programme.title: Bastardos sin gloria
programme.desc: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a group of Jewish-American soldiers known as "The Basterds" are chosen specifically to spread fear throughout the Third Reich by scalping and brutally killing Nazis. The Basterds, lead by Lt. Aldo Raine soon cross paths with a French-Jewish teenage girl who runs a movie theater in Paris which is targeted by the soldiers.

programme.title: The Settlers
programme.desc: In the nearly 50 years since Israel's decisive victory in the 1967 Six-Day War, hundreds of thousands of Israeli citizens have established expanding communities in the occupied territories of the West Bank. Frequently coming into direct conflict with the region's Palestinian inhabitants, and facing the condemnation of the international community, the settlers have been viewed by some as the righteous vanguard of modern Zionism and by others as overzealous squatters who are the greatest impediment to the possibility of peace in the region.

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: A WWII veteran escapes his care home in Northern Ireland and embarks on an arduous but inspirational journey to France to attend the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings, finding the courage to face the ghosts of his past.

programme.title: Loco y estupido amor
programme.desc: Cal Weaver is living the American dream. He has a good job, a beautiful house, great children and a beautiful wife, named Emily. Cal's seemingly perfect life unravels, however, when he learns that Emily has been unfaithful and wants a divorce. Over 40 and suddenly single, Cal is adrift in the fickle world of dating. Enter, Jacob Palmer, a self-styled player who takes Cal under his wing and teaches him how to be a hit with the ladies.

programme.title: Fiesta en casa
programme.desc: Aspiring club promoters and best buds Damon and Kevin are barely keeping things together. Out of money, down on their luck and about to lose the roofs over their heads—and freshly fired from their low-lift jobs as house cleaners—the pair needs a huge windfall to make their problems go away. In a ‘what the hell?’ move, they decide to host the party of the year at an exclusive mansion, the site of their last cleaning job, which just happens to belong to none other than LeBron James. No permission? No problem. What could go wrong?

programme.title: Mama's Boy
programme.desc: Middle-aged cinephile and film projectionist Pera still lives with his mother - and best friend - Mara, in Belgrade. It's 1999 and when NATO bombs start raining down on Serbia, the two of them become refugees. After a surreal journey, they end up in New York, where Pera realizes that he can no longer do the old job he loved so much. While he and Mara were struggling to survive, the new age of digital projection was born. Then Pera stumbles upon some discarded projectors and his new mission in life becomes clear: he will travel around and show people the magic of Real Cinema - the magic that can only be created by celluoid, mechanical projectors, the silver screen and flickering light.

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: Aspiring New York City artist John Hollar returns to his Middle America hometown on the eve of his mother’s brain surgery. Joined by his girlfriend, eight months pregnant with their first child, John is forced to navigate the crazy world he left behind.

programme.title: Elvis
programme.desc: An account of the life of Elvis Presley in the early days of his fame in the 1950s.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Como niños comunes y corrientes de la década de los 80s, Sam Brenner (Adam Sandler), Will Cooper (Kevin James), Ludlow Lamonsoff (Josh Gad) y Eddie Plant (Peter Dinklage) salvaron el mundo miles de veces en video juegos. Ahora, ellos deberán hacerlo en la vida real. En Piexeles, cuando alienígenas intergalácticos descubren señales de video juegos clásicos y malinterpretan estas señales como una amenaza. Ahora el actual presidente de los estados unidos, Will Cooper, debe llamar a sus viejos amigos de video juegos para salvar el mundo de ser destruidos por PAC-MAN, Donkey Kong, Galaga, Centipede y Space Invaders. Uniéndoseles al equipo a teniente Violet Van Patten (Michelle Monaghan), una especialista en suplir a los jugadores con armas únicas para combatir a los alienígenas.

programme.title: Robo en las alturas
programme.desc: A luxury condo manager leads a staff of workers to seek payback on the Wall Street swindler who defrauded them. With only days until the billionaire gets away with the perfect crime, the unlikely crew of amateur thieves enlists the help of petty crook Slide to steal the $20 million they’re sure is hidden in the penthouse.

programme.title: El Alma de la Fiesta
programme.desc: Cuando su marido repentinamente la abandona, Deanna (Melissa McCarthy), ama de casa de larga trayectoria, se lamenta de no haber terminado la universidad y decide volver a ella, aterrizando en la misma clase y universidad que su hija, que no está del todo acuerdo con la idea. Sumida en la experiencia del campus, la cada vez más abierta Deanna aprovecha la libertad, la diversión y los chicos de la fraternidad con sus propios términos, encontrando su verdadero yo en el último año que nadie esperaba.

programme.title: Mil veces hasta siempre
programme.desc: Aza confronts her potential for love, happiness, friendship, and hope while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts.

programme.title: Tammy
programme.desc: For Tammy, a burger-joint employee, a bad day keeps getting worse. She wrecks her car, loses her job, and finds that her husband has been unfaithful. It's time for Tammy to hit the road, but without money or transportation, her options are limited. Her only choice is a road trip with her hard-drinking grandmother, Pearl, who has a car, cash, and an itch to see Niagara Falls. It's not the escape Tammy had in mind, but it may be what she needs.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Como niños comunes y corrientes de la década de los 80s, Sam Brenner (Adam Sandler), Will Cooper (Kevin James), Ludlow Lamonsoff (Josh Gad) y Eddie Plant (Peter Dinklage) salvaron el mundo miles de veces en video juegos. Ahora, ellos deberán hacerlo en la vida real. En Piexeles, cuando alienígenas intergalácticos descubren señales de video juegos clásicos y malinterpretan estas señales como una amenaza. Ahora el actual presidente de los estados unidos, Will Cooper, debe llamar a sus viejos amigos de video juegos para salvar el mundo de ser destruidos por PAC-MAN, Donkey Kong, Galaga, Centipede y Space Invaders. Uniéndoseles al equipo a teniente Violet Van Patten (Michelle Monaghan), una especialista en suplir a los jugadores con armas únicas para combatir a los alienígenas.

programme.title: Lisa Frankenstein
programme.desc: Una adolescente incomprendida y su amor de la escuela secundaria, que resulta ser un hermoso cadáver. Después de que una serie de circunstancias divertidas y horribles lo volvieran a la vida, los dos se embarcan en un mortífero viaje para encontrar el amor, la felicidad… y algunas partes del cuerpo perdidas en el camino.

programme.title: El mago
programme.desc: A slapstick fantasy of the amorous adventures of a magician a la Cantinflas.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: A curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school is forced to remain on campus during Christmas break to babysit the handful of students with nowhere to go. Eventually, he forms an unlikely bond with one of them — a damaged, brainy troublemaker — and with the school’s head cook, who has just lost a son in Vietnam.

programme.title: Un cuento de invierno
programme.desc: A burglar falls for an heiress as she dies in his arms. When he learns that he has the gift of reincarnation, he sets out to save her.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: The Arabic version of the popular, late-night comedy sketch show features celebrity guests, parodies, and a variety of laugh-out-loud antics.

programme.title: Experta en Crisis
programme.desc: Based on the documentary "Our Brand Is Crisis", this feature focuses on the use of American political campaign strategies in South America.

programme.title: Estado de fúria
programme.desc: Five women face extreme situations that will unleash their rage.

programme.title: Cóctel explosivo
programme.desc: To protect an 8-year-old girl, a dangerous assassin reunites with her mother and her lethal associates to take down a ruthless crime syndicate and its army of henchmen.

programme.title: Una suegra de cuidado
programme.desc: Office temp Charlotte Cantilini thinks she's found Mr. Right when she starts dating gorgeous surgeon Dr. Kevin Fields. But there's a problem standing in the way of everlasting bliss: Kevin's overbearing and controlling mother, Viola. Fearing she'll lose her son's affections forever, Viola decides to break up the happy couple by becoming the world's worst mother-in-law.

programme.title: Marmalade
programme.desc: Marmalade is a romantic comedy about a fashion model who gets too old to continue her work. Her demise in her professional life happens as her personal life falls completely apart.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim Vs. Los Ex De La Chica De Sus Sueños
programme.desc: Nombre que recibe la película "Scott Pilgrim vs. The World" en Latinoamérica.

programme.title: Son como niños 2
programme.desc: Lenny has relocated his family back to the small town where he and his friends grew up. This time around, the grown ups are the ones learning lessons from their kids on a day notoriously full of surprises—the last day of school.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: The Arabic version of the popular, late-night comedy sketch show features celebrity guests, parodies, and a variety of laugh-out-loud antics.

programme.title: Jack y Jill
programme.desc: Jack Sadelstein (Adam Sandler) es un exitoso ejecutivo de publicidad en Los Ángeles con una hermosa esposa llamada Erin (Katie Holmes), que le teme a un evento de cada año: la visita de su hermana gemela idéntica Jill (Adam Sandler) en el día de Acción de Gracias. La necesidad y la agresividad pasiva de Jill es enloquecedora para Jack, volviendo su vida normalmente tranquila al revés.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: An epic tale spanning forty years in the life of Celie, an African-American woman living in the South who survives incredible abuse and bigotry. After Celie's abusive father marries her off to the equally debasing 'Mister' Albert Johnson, things go from bad to worse, leaving Celie to find companionship anywhere she can. She perseveres, holding on to her dream of one day being reunited with her sister in Africa.

programme.title: Un equipo muy especial
programme.desc: In 1943, Carson Shaw travels to Chicago to try out for the All-American Girls Professional Baseball League. There, she meets other women who also dream of playing pro baseball and makes connections that open up her world. Rockford local Max Chapman also comes to the tryouts but is turned away. With the support of her best friend Clance, she must forge a new path to pursue her dream.

programme.title: Back to Black
programme.desc: La extraordinaria historia del ascenso temprano de Amy Winehouse (Marisa Abela) a la fama desde sus primeros días en Camden hasta la realización de su innovador álbum, Back to Black, que catapultó a Winehouse a la fama mundial. Contada a través de los ojos de Amy e inspirada en sus letras profundamente personales, la película explora y abarca las muchas capas de la artista icónica y la tumultuosa historia de amor en el centro de uno de los álbumes más legendarios de todos los tiempos.

programme.title: La boda de mi mejor amigo
programme.desc: A woman is determined to stop the wedding of her best friend, since she has been secretly in love with him.

programme.title: Dog Un viaje salvaje
programme.desc: An army ranger and his dog embark on a road trip along the Pacific Coast Highway to attend a friend's funeral.

programme.title: Cincuenta Sombras más Oscuras
programme.desc: Anastasia Steele (Dakota Johnson) después de su rompimiento con Christian Grey (Jamie Dornan) ella decide retomar una carrera profesional en una editorial en Seattle. En una demostración de arte en Seattle encuentra a Christian y este todavía tiene domino en la mente de Anastasia y deciden retomar tórrida y sensual relación, Ana averiguará aún más del doloroso pasado de Christian, mientras tanto el peleará contra sus demonios internos. Anastasia deberá enfrentarse a la envida e ira de las mujeres que la precedieron, pero esta tendrá que tomar decisiones importantes para su vida.

programme.title: Virgen a los 40
programme.desc: Andy Stitzer has a pleasant life with a nice apartment and a job stamping invoices at an electronics store. But at age 40, there's one thing Andy hasn't done, and it's really bothering his sex-obsessed male co-workers: Andy is still a virgin. Determined to help Andy get laid, the guys make it their mission to de-virginize him. But it all seems hopeless until Andy meets small business owner Trish, a single mom.

programme.title: Loco y estupido amor
programme.desc: Cal Weaver is living the American dream. He has a good job, a beautiful house, great children and a beautiful wife, named Emily. Cal's seemingly perfect life unravels, however, when he learns that Emily has been unfaithful and wants a divorce. Over 40 and suddenly single, Cal is adrift in the fickle world of dating. Enter, Jacob Palmer, a self-styled player who takes Cal under his wing and teaches him how to be a hit with the ladies.

programme.title: El padre de la novia
programme.desc: Proud father Stanley Banks remembers the day his daughter, Kay, got married. Starting when she announces her engagement through to the wedding itself, we learn of all the surprises and disasters along the way.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Follow the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dyrdek takes the funniest amateur internet videos and builds them into an episode of edgy, funny, and most importantly, timeless television.

programme.title: Pequeña Navidad
programme.desc: Julie is adjusting to being a single mother to a grieving child while facing her first Christmas without her husband when she develops an unexpected friendship with her older neighbor Irene.

programme.title: Splitting Adam
programme.desc: After accidentally stumbling into his uncle's mysterious "tanning bed", Adam learns the answer to all of his problems - multiple Adams. With his new collection of clones, Adam is hopping on one wild summer ride with an epic splash.

programme.title: Penélope
programme.desc: When Penelope gets married to banker James Elcott, she finds him too preoccupied with work to pay much attention to her, so she robs his bank in disguise. After she confesses to her psychiatrist, Greg Mannix, he offers to return the money for her, as he is secretly in love with her. However, he abandons the money when the police approach. Penelope becomes determined to admit to the crime, but neither James nor the police believe her story.

programme.title: Persiguiendo un sueño
programme.desc: Leonardo sells spare parts, but his dream is to become a screenwriter and write films for Hollywood. Inspired by the real-life situations of screenwriter and producer Leonardo De León while trying to make his film "Don't Let Alberto Fall Into Temptation (2014)".

programme.title: Legalmente Rubia
programme.desc: Fashionable sorority queen Elle Woods has it all, but, she wants nothing more than to be Mrs. Warner Huntington III. But he dumps her before heading to Harvard Law School. Elle rallies all of her resources and gets into Harvard, determined to win him back. While there, she figures out that there is more to herself than just good looks.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: En un futuro no muy lejano un policía de la ciudad de Detroit llamado Alex J. Murphy (Peter Weller) persigue a una banda de delincuentes pero es atrapado y acribillado a balazos al punto que es dado por muerto pero una compañía llamada OCP, que es la encargada de mostrar un producto para combatir el crimen lleva a cabo la tarea de utilizar a este hombre para convertirlo en un ciborg que ayude a combatir el crimen.

programme.title: Street Fighter The Legend
programme.desc: When a teenager, Chun-Li witnesses the kidnapping of her father by wealthy crime lord M. Bison. When she grows up, she goes on a quest for vengeance and becomes the famous crime-fighter of the Street Fighter universe.

programme.title: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she finds herself on the island where her father disappeared.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: Callum Lynch (Michael Fassbender), un hombre condenado a muerte es sometido a una tecnología revolucionaria que desbloquea sus recuerdos genéticos. Cuando Callum despierta, Sophia Rikkin (Marion Cotillard) le explica que es lo que paso y lo que está sucediendo y porque está teniendo recuerdos de su antepasado, Aguilar – Un asesino de una sociedad secreta – en la España del siglo XV. Ahora Callum deberá utilizar este increíble conocimiento y destrezas para detener la opresiva y poderosa organización templaria del presente.

programme.title: Los 800
programme.desc: During the turbulent 19th century, a number of brilliant French artists developed the Romantic movement in Paris: writers Victor Hugo, Alexandre Dumas, George Sand, Honoré de Balzac and Charles Baudelaire, painter Eugène Delacroix and composer Hector Berlioz, among others, changed the way of looking at art and created enduring works that have inspired the world to this day.

programme.desc: Rob Dyrdek takes the funniest amateur internet videos and builds them into an episode of edgy, funny, and most importantly, timeless television.

programme.title: Splitting Adam
programme.desc: After accidentally stumbling into his uncle's mysterious "tanning bed", Adam learns the answer to all of his problems - multiple Adams. With his new collection of clones, Adam is hopping on one wild summer ride with an epic splash.

programme.title: Leyendas del Templo Escondido
programme.desc: In a Temple filled with lost treasures and protected by mysterious Mayan temple guards, six teams of two children compete to retrieve one of the historical artifacts in the Temple by performing physical stunts and answering questions based on history, mythology, and geography. After three elimination rounds, only one team remains, who then earns the right to go through the Temple to retrieve the artifact within three minutes and win a grand prize.

programme.title: Persiguiendo un sueño
programme.desc: Leonardo sells spare parts, but his dream is to become a screenwriter and write films for Hollywood. Inspired by the real-life situations of screenwriter and producer Leonardo De León while trying to make his film "Don't Let Alberto Fall Into Temptation (2014)".

programme.title: Sophie
programme.desc:
Sophie is a Canadian television sitcom that aired on CBC from January 9, 2008 to March 23, 2009.
It stars Natalie Brown as Sophie Parker, an unmarried single mother and talent agent. The show is an English-language adaptation of Télévision de Radio-Canada's show Les Hauts et les bas de Sophie Paquin.
The show was created by Richard Blaimert and its executive producer is Jocelyn Deschênes, the same creative team behind the original series. It was the CBC's second attempt in as many years to create an English adaptation of a successful series from its French sister network, following the less successful Rumours.
In February 2008, it was announced that the show had been bought by ABC Family, part of Disney-ABC Television Group in the United States. The network signed on for the first 13 episodes, as well as an option for the second season of the show.
On March 27, 2009, the series was cancelled by CBC due to poor ratings.

programme.title: Street Fighter The Legend
programme.desc: When a teenager, Chun-Li witnesses the kidnapping of her father by wealthy crime lord M. Bison. When she grows up, she goes on a quest for vengeance and becomes the famous crime-fighter of the Street Fighter universe.

programme.title: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she finds herself on the island where her father disappeared.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: Callum Lynch (Michael Fassbender), un hombre condenado a muerte es sometido a una tecnología revolucionaria que desbloquea sus recuerdos genéticos. Cuando Callum despierta, Sophia Rikkin (Marion Cotillard) le explica que es lo que paso y lo que está sucediendo y porque está teniendo recuerdos de su antepasado, Aguilar – Un asesino de una sociedad secreta – en la España del siglo XV. Ahora Callum deberá utilizar este increíble conocimiento y destrezas para detener la opresiva y poderosa organización templaria del presente.

programme.title: 12 Monos
programme.desc: The provocative story of Cole, a time traveler from a decimated future in a high-stakes race against the clock. Utilizing a dangerous and untested method of time travel, he journeys from 2043 to the present day on a mission to locate and eradicate the source of a deadly plague that will all but annihilate the human race.

programme.title: El silencio de los inocentes
programme.desc: Clarice Starling is a top student at the FBI's training academy. Jack Crawford wants Clarice to interview Dr. Hannibal Lecter, a brilliant psychiatrist who is also a violent psychopath, serving life behind bars for various acts of murder and cannibalism. Crawford believes that Lecter may have insight into a case and that Starling, as an attractive young woman, may be just the bait to draw him out.

programme.title: Persecución mortal
programme.desc: Involves a serial killer.

programme.title: Oculus
programme.desc: A woman tries to exonerate her brother's murder conviction by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dyrdek takes the funniest amateur internet videos and builds them into an episode of edgy, funny, and most importantly, timeless television.

programme.title: Leyendas del Templo Escondido
programme.desc: In a Temple filled with lost treasures and protected by mysterious Mayan temple guards, six teams of two children compete to retrieve one of the historical artifacts in the Temple by performing physical stunts and answering questions based on history, mythology, and geography. After three elimination rounds, only one team remains, who then earns the right to go through the Temple to retrieve the artifact within three minutes and win a grand prize.

programme.title: ¡Oye, Arnold! la película
programme.desc: Arnold and his friends must recover a stolen document in order to prevent the neighborhood from being bulldozed.

programme.title: Smitty
programme.desc: A mischievous thirteen-year-old crosses paths with a lovable mutt named Smitty, and with help from the unlikely canine companion, learns the importance of friendship, family and responsibility.

programme.title: Siempre a tu lado
programme.desc: This is the story of a puppy that touched hundreds of millions of people around the world. Hachiko is a cute Chinese pastoral dog. He met his destined owner Chen Jingxiu in the vast crowd and became a member of the Chen family. With the passage of time, the once beautiful home is no longer there, but Batong is still waiting where it is, and its fate is closely tied to its family.

programme.title: El pico de Dante
programme.desc: Volcanologist Harry Dalton comes to the sleepy town of Dante's Peak to investigate the recent rumblings of the dormant volcano the burg is named for. Before long, his worst fears are realized when a massive eruption hits, and immediately, Harry, the mayor and the townspeople find themselves fighting for their lives amid a catastrophic nightmare.

programme.title: 12 Monos
programme.desc: The provocative story of Cole, a time traveler from a decimated future in a high-stakes race against the clock. Utilizing a dangerous and untested method of time travel, he journeys from 2043 to the present day on a mission to locate and eradicate the source of a deadly plague that will all but annihilate the human race.

programme.title: Por fin adolescente
programme.desc: A seemingly bright and mostly innocent 16-year-old named Mo attempts to navigate high school under the guidance of his best friend Zeke, an unmotivated-yet-charismatic college dropout. Although Zeke genuinely cares about Mo, things start to go awry as he teaches Mo nontraditional life lessons in drug dealing, partying, and dating. Meanwhile, Mo’s well-meaning dad tries to step in and take back the reins of his son’s upbringing.

programme.title: Nacido el 4 de Julio
programme.desc: Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, Ron Kovic becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.

programme.title: La leyenda del jinete sin
programme.desc: Skeptical young detective Ichabod Crane gets transferred to the hamlet of Sleepy Hollow, New York, where he is tasked with investigating the decapitations of three people – murders the townsfolk attribute to a legendary specter, The Headless Horseman.

programme.title: Séptimo
programme.desc: The adventures of a Chilean female spy and a small Regiment during the Saltpeter War.

programme.title: Las crónicas de Spiderwick
programme.desc: The coming-of-age story of the Grace Family, as they move from New York to Michigan and into their family's ancestral home. Upon arrival, the family not only uncovers mysteries hidden inside their great grandfather's Spiderwick Estate, but also discovers a secret, fantastical world around them.

programme.title: Aliens stole my body
programme.desc: The Galactic Patrol is back - but they've lost Deputy Rod Allbright's body. It's been stolen by B'KR, the most fiendish villain in the galaxy, which leaves Rod's mind sharing one body with his annoying cousin Elspeth. Stranded on a mysterious alien planet, our young heroes embark on a mission to find the only being who can stop B'KR once and for all, the legendary time-strider himself; Art Allbright - who also happens to be Rod's dad. The Galactic Patrol's high-flying adventures continue in this thrilling second film based on the global best-selling book series from acclaimed author Bruce Coville and Simon and Schuster Children's Publishing. This rip-roaring sequel draws the crew of the Good Ship Ferkel into a web of alien plots that will test their courage to the utmost -- and ultimately bring them face-to-face with one of the galaxy's most guarded secrets.

programme.title: Roald & Beatrix Tail of the
programme.desc: Roald & Beatrix, the tail of the curious mouse, a heart-warming Christmas film inspired by the true encounter between a six-year-old Roald Dahl and his idol Beatrix Potter. A magical story of what really can happen when you are brave enough to follow your dreams. Joining Dawn French who plays Beatrix, the cast includes Jessica Hynes, Rob Brydon, Alison Steadman, Nina Sosanya, Bill Bailey and Nick Mohammed.

programme.title: Tras líneas enemigas
programme.desc: While flying a routine reconnaissance mission over Bosnia, fighter pilot Lt. Chris Burnett photographs something he wasn't supposed to see and gets shot down behind enemy lines, where he must outrun an army led by a ruthless Serbian general. With time running out and a deadly tracker on his trail, Burnett's commanding officer, Admiral Reigart, decides to risk his career and launch a renegade rescue mission to save his life.

programme.title: Misión Babilonia
programme.desc: A veteran-turned-mercenary is hired to take a young woman with a secret from post-apocalyptic Eastern Europe to New York City.

programme.title: Feliz Día de tu Muerte 2
programme.desc: Theresa "Tree" Gelbman (Jessica Rothe) descubre que morir una y otra vez fue sorprendentemente más fácil que los peligros que se aproximan.

programme.title: La generación eco
programme.desc: Five post grads figure the best way to get back at the unfair economy and live the life they've always wanted is to steal from the rich and give to themselves.

programme.title: Bring Your Own Brigade
programme.desc: An investigation into our landscape's hidden fire stories and on-the-ground experiences of firefighters and residents struggling through deadly fires.

programme.title: Sin rodeos
programme.desc: Paz seems to have a perfect life. She has a job, a partner and friends but something's missing. In reality, there are things she is unhappy about. She feels anxious and burdened but can't bring herself to express these feelings. Until one day she turns to a strange therapy that will make her say absolutely everything she thinks. How would your life be if you only said what you think?

programme.title: La leyenda del jinete sin
programme.desc: Skeptical young detective Ichabod Crane gets transferred to the hamlet of Sleepy Hollow, New York, where he is tasked with investigating the decapitations of three people – murders the townsfolk attribute to a legendary specter, The Headless Horseman.

programme.title: Las crónicas de Spiderwick
programme.desc: The coming-of-age story of the Grace Family, as they move from New York to Michigan and into their family's ancestral home. Upon arrival, the family not only uncovers mysteries hidden inside their great grandfather's Spiderwick Estate, but also discovers a secret, fantastical world around them.

programme.title: Jorge, el curioso
programme.desc: Looking for the perfect photograph, but everything comes at a price.

programme.title: Locuras en la nieve
programme.desc: A spectacular sled race through the village. Frankie-Four-Eyes and his team, including Sophie as the driver, take on the newcomers: the mysterious and conceited Zac and his athletic cousin Charlie.

programme.title: Un Amigo Abominable
programme.desc: Abominable lleva al público a una aventura épica de 2,000 millas desde las calles de una ciudad china a los impresionantes paisajes nevados del himalaya. Cuando la adolescente Yi (Chloe Bennet) se encuentra con un joven Yeti en el techo de su apartamento, ella y sus amigos Jin (Tenzing Norgay Trainor) y Peng (Albert Tsai), lo nombran "Everest" y se embarcan en una búsqueda épica para reunir a la criatura mágica con su familia en el punto más alto de la Tierra.

programme.title: Need for Speed: La Película
programme.desc: Un corredor de autos llamado Tobey Marshall (Aaron Paul) es liberado de prisión luego de cumplir una condena por un crimen que no cometió, ahora Marshall ingresa a una carrera que recorre el país con su mente puesta en vengar la muerte de su ex compañero.

programme.title: El Protegido
programme.desc: A film producer, his wife (an actress) and her lover (a young scriptwriter) are part of a love triangle that will lead to a crime. It is set during the decay of Argentinian cinema studios.

programme.title: El fin de los tiempos
programme.desc: While a young man is sitting on a bench, a mysterious girl appears next to him. When he takes her hand, a series of memories come to him. What memories will this reunion with the girl bring back?

programme.title: La última noche
programme.desc: Freely inspired by the life of the actress Sandra Mozarowsky, who died in 1977 when she fell from the terrace of her house in Madrid, the story will focus on the day before the accident, in which loneliness, fear and anguish in the face of a situation desperate mix with his dreams and ambitions.

programme.title: Venganza
programme.desc: A friend's reunion turns out to be a table for revenge.

programme.title: Pearl in Paradise
programme.desc: Magazine photographer Alex Anderson and author Colin Page head to Fiji in search of the illusive blue pearl that Colin wrote about in his bestselling novel Pearl in Paradise. Alex stands to land the creative director position if she can photograph the pearl for the magazine’s 30th anniversary issue, and Colin hopes that by writing a guest article about the long-lost gem he can boost sales of his failing other books and not lose his publisher. As the two head off to their search, neither is aware yet that finding love could be the rarest adventure of all.

programme.title: La lista de los deseos
programme.desc: Eva and Carmen are two women who meet in the worst place: the doctor’s office, waiting to hear the results of their cancer screenings. So Carmen has an idea: why don’t she and Eva rent an RV with her best pal, Mar, make a list of things they’ve always wanted to do… and do them.

programme.title: Yes, i do
programme.desc: Busy chocolatier Charlotte has left her boyfriend James at the altar three times and now she needs to prove to him that she really does want to marry him. Things are complicated when James’ ex-girlfriend Nicole, who is also the owner of Chocolate Monthly Magazine, arrives on the scene and says she wants him back.

programme.title: Los amigos del barrio
programme.desc: Take a stroll down Sesame Street and witness the birth of the most influential children's show in television history. From the iconic furry characters to the classic songs you know by heart, learn how a gang of visionary creators changed the world.

programme.title: Tras líneas enemigas
programme.desc: While flying a routine reconnaissance mission over Bosnia, fighter pilot Lt. Chris Burnett photographs something he wasn't supposed to see and gets shot down behind enemy lines, where he must outrun an army led by a ruthless Serbian general. With time running out and a deadly tracker on his trail, Burnett's commanding officer, Admiral Reigart, decides to risk his career and launch a renegade rescue mission to save his life.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Christian Grey (Jamie Dornan) y Anastasia Steele (Dakota Johnson), regresan en el tercer capítulo de la saga Cincuentas Sombras de Grey.

programme.title: Matar o morir
programme.desc: Mexican rancher goes to Texas to track down his son's murderer.

programme.title: Hollywood one on one
programme.desc: Cast and crew reunite to film a spin-off, this time set in Hollywood, boasting more zealous zombies and beefed up with international characters.

programme.title: Tom y Jerry
programme.desc: Sigue las alocadas aventuras del juego original del gato y al ratón. Tom, un gato doméstico ordinario, persigue al molesto ratón Jerry para su cena. Pero Jerry, el roedor ingenioso y audaz que comparte la casa con Tom, no puede evitar burlarse de su némesis felino y frustrar todos sus intentos de atraparlo.

programme.title: Plan de escape: El rescate
programme.desc: After security expert Ray Breslin is hired to rescue the kidnapped daughter of a Hong Kong tech mogul from a formidable Latvian prison, Breslin's girlfriend is also captured. Now he and his team must pull off a deadly rescue mission to confront their sadistic foe and save the hostages before time runs out.

programme.title: Los Duros
programme.desc: Three boys, after participating in the events of 1968 in Mexico, find themselves in the need to get away from the social struggle

programme.title: Dos inútiles en patrulla
programme.desc: Detectives Jimmy and Paul, despite nine years as partners, can still sometimes seem like polar opposites—especially when Paul's unpredictable antics get them suspended without pay. Already strapped for cash and trying to pay for his daughter's wedding, Jimmy decides to sell a rare baseball card that's worth tens of thousands. Unfortunately, when the collector's shop is robbed and the card vanishes with the crook, Paul and Jimmy end up going rogue, tracking down the card and the drug ring behind its theft, all on their own time and without any backup—except for each other.

programme.title: Popular Theory
programme.desc: Erwin, a girl genius, is the youngest student in high school. Unfortunately she struggles with social isolation. When she meets fellow science guru, Winston, they team up to invent a chemical that changes the high school hierarchy forever.

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Clear the runway for Derek Zoolander, VH1's three-time male model of the year. His face falls when hippie-chic Hansel scooters in to steal this year's award. The evil fashion guru Mugatu seizes the opportunity to turn Derek into a killing machine. It's a well-designed conspiracy and only with the help of Hansel and a few well-chosen accessories like Matilda can Derek make the world safe for male models everywhere.

programme.title: Un lugar llamado Notting Hill
programme.desc: London bookstore owner William Thacker's quiet life turns upside down when a chance encounter with famous actress Anna Scott sparks an unlikely romance challenged by their vastly different worlds.

programme.title: Matar o morir
programme.desc: Mexican rancher goes to Texas to track down his son's murderer.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: A tough cop is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers.

programme.title: Hollywood one on one
programme.desc: Cast and crew reunite to film a spin-off, this time set in Hollywood, boasting more zealous zombies and beefed up with international characters.

programme.title: Un lugar llamado Notting Hill

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: A mild-mannered guy who is engaged to a monstrous woman meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.

programme.title: Un detective suelto en Hollywood
programme.desc: Fast-talking, quick-thinking Detroit street cop Axel Foley has bent more than a few rules and regs in his time, but when his best friend is murdered, he heads to sunny Beverly Hills to work the case like only he can.

programme.title: Un detective suelto en Hollywood 2
programme.desc: Axel Foley returns to the land of sunshine and palm trees to investigate the near-fatal shooting of police Captain Andrew Bogomil. With the help of Sgt. Taggart and Det. Rosewood, they soon uncover that the shooting is associated with a series of "alphabet" robberies masterminded by a heartless weapons kingpin—and the chase is on.

programme.title: Un Detective Suelto en Hollywood 3
programme.desc: When his boss is killed, Detroit cop Axel Foley finds evidence that the murderer had ties to a California amusement park called Wonder World. Returning to sunny Beverly Hills once more, Foley reunites with Detective Billy Rosewood to solve the case. Along with Billy's new partner, Detective Jon Flint, they discover that Wonder World is being used as a front for a massive counterfeiting ring.

programme.title: Terremoto La falla de San Andrés
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey across the state in order to rescue his estranged daughter.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events—in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. But despite all he has achieved, his one true love eludes him.

programme.title: Judas and the Black Messiah
programme.desc: El presidente Fred Hampton (Daniel Kaluuya) tenía 21 años cuando fue asesinado por el FBI, que coaccionó a un delincuente menor llamado William O'Neal (Lakeith Stanfield) para ayudarlos a silenciarlo a él y al Partido Pantera Negra. Pero no pudieron matar el legado de Fred Hampton y, 50 años después, sus palabras aún resuenan… más fuerte que nunca.¡Soy un revolucionario!En 1968, un activista joven y carismático llamado Fred Hampton se convirtió en presidente de la sección de Illinois del Partido Pantera Negra, que luchaba por la libertad, el poder de determinar el destino de la comunidad afroamericana, y el fin de la brutalidad policial y la matanza de Personas de raza negra.El presidente Fred estaba inspirado a una generación a levantarse y no retroceder a la opresión, lo que lo puso directamente en la línea de fuego del gobierno, el FBI y la policía de Chicago. Pero para destruir la revolución, tenían que hacerlo tanto desde fuera… como desde dentro. De cara a la cárcel, el FBI le ofrece a William O'Neal un trato: si se infiltra en las Panteras Negras y proporciona información sobre Hampton, saldrá libre. O'Neal acepta el trato.O'Neal, ahora compañero de armas del Partido Pantera Negra, vive con el temor de que su traición sea descubierta incluso mientras asciende en las filas. Pero a medida que lo atrae el ardiente mensaje de Hampton, O'Neal no puede escapar de la trayectoria mortal de su traición Final.Aunque su vida se truncó, el impacto de Fred Hampton ha continuado resonando. El gobierno vio a las Panteras Negras como una amenaza militante al status quo y vendió esa mentira a un público asustado en una época de creciente malestar civil. Pero la percepción de los Panteras no era la realidad. En el interior de las ciudades de todo Estados Unidos, estaban proporcionando desayunos gratuitos para niños, servicios legales, clínicas médicas e investigación sobre la anemia de células falciformes y educación política. Y fue el presidente Fred en Chicago quien, reconoció el poder de la unidad multicultural por una causa común, creó la Coalición Arcoíris, uniendo fuerza con otros pueblos oprimidos de la ciudad para luchar por la igualdad y el empoderamiento político.

programme.title: Empire state
programme.desc: In the docklands of East London stands the Empire State, a nightclub full of magic and mystery. Designed like an ocean liner, it's become a battle ground where anything can happen. In the midst of the action, a young boy stows aboard to search for his friend who has disappeared in the entrails of the club.

programme.desc: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey across the state in order to rescue his estranged daughter.

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

Pero la percepción de los Panteras no era la realidad. En el interior de las ciudades de todo Estados Unidos, estaban proporcionando desayunos gratuitos para niños, servicios legales, clínicas médicas e investigación sobre la anemia de células falciformes y educación política. Y fue el presidente Fred en Chicago quien, reconoció el poder de la unidad multicultural por una causa común, creó la Coalición Arcoíris, uniendo fuerza con otros pueblos oprimidos de la ciudad para luchar por la igualdad y el empoderamiento político.

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

programme.title: Hollywood one on one
programme.desc: Cast and crew reunite to film a spin-off, this time set in Hollywood, boasting more zealous zombies and beefed up with international characters.

programme.title: Película
programme.desc: The Momonsters are spending their first vacation in a campsite in the middle of the forest! Exploring the nature, doing outdoor activities, telling stories around a campfire… Any child’s dream vacation. However, over their first night there, they find the diary of a previous camper stating that there’s a treasure hidden in the woods. “Super cool!” but it’s guarded by a scary ghost. “Not so cool…”
